200.description: Get all unified accounts (both Bridge and direct Web3) with optional filtering

201.description: Create unified account - either Bridge liquidation address or direct Web3 recipient

200.description: Fetch virtual account from Bridge and save updated version to the local DB
Fetch all virtual account activity from Bridge (non-paginated)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return per page

200.description: Fetch virtual account activity from Bridge with pagination
Get all direct Web3 recipients for the authenticated user
Get a specific direct Web3 recipient by ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of items to return per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Base64-encoded cursor for paginated results (from previous nextCursor)

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filter by transactions occurring after this date (ISO format)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filter by transactions occurring before this date (ISO format)

get.summary: Get current forex rates from cache
Get current forex rates for authenticated users (USD and EUR)

200.description: Current forex rates for authenticated users

post.summary: Manually fetch and update forex rates

auth0Id.description: The Auth0 ID associated with the user

id.description: Unique identifier for the customer record

bridgeCustomerId.description: The Bridge customer ID for the user

status.description: The current status of the customer (e.g., active, suspended)

type.description: Type of customer, either individual or business

future_requirements_due.description: List of future requirements that are due for the customer

requirements_due.description: List of current requirements that are due for the customer

capabilities.description: Capabilities of the customer, represented as key-value pairs

persona_inquiry_type.description: Type of Persona inquiry performed for the customer (e.g., identity verification)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the customer record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the customer record was last updated

has_accepted_terms_of_service.description: Whether the customer has accepted the terms of service

signed_agreement_id.description: Internal identifier for the signed TOS agreement that can be used for attestation

endorsements.description: List of endorsements with the name and status of each endorsement

auth0Id.description: The Auth0 ID associated with the user

id.description: Unique identifier for the KYC record

bridgeKycId.description: Unique identifier from Bridge for the KYC process

full_name.description: Full name of the user undergoing KYC

type.description: Type of KYC process (e.g., individual, business)

kyc_link.description: Link to the KYC document or verification page

tos_link.description: Link to the Terms of Service document

kyc_status.description: Status of the KYC process (e.g., pending, approved)

tos_status.description: Status of the Terms of Service agreement (e.g., accepted, not accepted)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the KYC record was created

customer_id.description: Customer ID linked to the user in your system

persona_inquiry_type.description: Type of Persona inquiry used (e.g., identity, verification)

privySmartWalletAddress.description: Privy smart wallet address (smart contract wallet)

enum: Individual / Sole Proprietor or single-member LLC
Certified deemed-compliant nonregistering local bank (Complete Part V)
Certified deemed-compliant FFI with only low-value accounts (Complete Part VI)
Certified deemed-compliant sponsored, closely held investment vehicle (Complete Part VII)
Certified deemed-compliant limited life debt investment entity (Complete Part VIII)
Certain investment entities that dont maintain financial accounts (Complete Part IX)
Foreign government, government of a U.S. possession, or foreign central bank of issue (Complete Part XIII)
Entity wholly owned by exempt beneficial owners (Complete Part XVI)
Excepted nonfinancial group entity (Complete Part XVIII)
Excepted nonfinancial start-up company (Complete Part XIX)
Excepted nonfinancial entity in liquidation or bankruptcy (Complete Part XX)
Publicly traded NFFE or NFFE affiliate of a publicly traded corporation (Complete Part XXIII)
Sponsored direct reporting NFFE (Complete Part XXVIII)
Account that is not a financial account
Nonparticipating FFI (including an FFI related to a Reporting IGA FFI other than a deemed-compliant FFI, participating FFI, or exempt beneficial owner)
Registered deemed-compliant FFI (other than a reporting Model 1 FFI, sponsored FFI, or nonreporting IGA FFI covered in Part XII)
Tax-exempt pension trust or pension fund
Subsidiary of a publicly traded corporation
Company that meets the ownership and base erosion test
Company that meets the derivative benefits test
Company with an item of income that meets active trade or business test
Favorable discretionary determination by the U.S. competent authority received

privySmartWalletAddress.description: Privy smart wallet address (smart contract wallet)

tosAccepted.description: Indicates that the user has accepted the terms of service in your application

signedAgreementId.description: Internal identifier for the signed TOS agreement that can be used for attestation

developer_accepted_tos.description: Indicates that the developer has accepted the terms of service on behalf of the user

auth0Id.description: The Auth0 ID associated with the user

id.description: Unique identifier for the banking information record

account_type.description: Type of bank account (e.g., checking, savings)

currency.description: Currency associated with the account (e.g., USD, EUR)

customer_id.description: Customer ID linked to the user in your system

account_owner_name.description: Full name of the account owner

bank_name.description: Name of the bank where the account is held

last_4.description: Last 4 digits of the account number

active.description: Whether the account is active or not

beneficiary_address_valid.description: Indicates whether the beneficiary address is valid

account.description: Account details including last 4 digits, routing number, and account type

iban.description: Iban account details including last 4 digits

created_at.description: Timestamp when the banking information was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the banking information was last updated

bridgeExternalAccountId.description: Bridge external account Id, from bankin-info entity

auth0Id.description: The Auth0 ID associated with the user

id.description: Unique identifier for the liquidation address record

bridgeLiquidationAddressId.description: The Bridge liquidation address ID associated with the user

chain.description: The blockchain chain associated with the liquidation address (e.g., Ethereum, Bitcoin)

state.description: The state or status of the liquidation address

address.description: The address associated with the liquidation

currency.description: The currency used for the liquidation (e.g., USD, EUR, BTC)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the liquidation address record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the liquidation address record was last updated

developer_fee.description: Developer fee details associated with the liquidation address

external_account_id.description: External account ID related to the liquidation address

destination_currency.description: Currency to be received at the destination address

destination_payment_rail.description: Payment rail used for the destination transaction (e.g., SWIFT, PayPal)

custom_developer_fee_percent.description: Custom developer fee percentage for the liquidation process

payment_rail.description: The payment rail used for the transaction.

address.description: The crypto wallet address that the customer wishes to receive funds at.

auth0Id.description: The Auth0 ID associated with the user

id.description: Unique identifier for the liquidation address record

vault_name.description: Custom name of the virtual account. (vault)

transferType.description: Transfer type - bridge for traditional Bridge flow, direct_web3 for direct Web3 transfers

destinationAddress.description: Destination address for crypto payments (required for direct Web3 transfers)

source.description: Source details including the currency type.

payment_rail.description: The payment rail used for the transaction.

sender_name.example: The name of the business or individual who initiated the ACH

sender_bank_routing_number.description: The routing number of the sender bank.

trace_number.description: A unique 15-digit trace number used for tracking.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the event was created.

webhookId.description: Unique ID of the webhook destination.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the webhook was created.

id.description: Globally unique ID for the transaction item

items.description: List of paginated transaction items for the current page

limit.description: Number of items returned in this page

count.description: Number of items returned in this page

nextCursor.description: Base64-encoded cursor for fetching the next page. Pass this as `cursor` in the next request.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when rates were last updated

account_number.description: The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) that will be used to send the funds

bic.description: The Bank Identifier Code (BIC) that will be used to send the funds

country.description: Country in which the bank account is located. It`s a three-letter alpha-3 country code as defined in the ISO 3166-1 spec.

account_owner_type.description: The type of the account ownership. Required when the account_type is iban. For individual ownership, first_name and last_name are required. For business ownership, business_name is required.

first_name.description: First name of the individual account holder. Required when the account_owner_type is individual

business_name.description: Business name of the business account holder. Required when the account_owner_type is business

last_name.description: First name of the individual account holder. Required when the account_owner_type is individual

currency.description: The source currency, for US only usd

payment_rail.description: Available payment rails. For EUR only sepa

currency.description: The source currency, for IBNA only eur

payment_rails.description: Available payment rails. For EUR only sepa

payment_rail.description: Available payment rails. For EUR only sepa
